title: FS: t206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 5
author: ynnek4

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Ty Cobb Bat Off PSA 5
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I have my eye on something else at the moment so I figured I would see if there is any interest in this one.

$3100 via PayPal "gift", money order, or personal check.  Price is firm.

Please leave message then PM.

Thanks a lot.


[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/30n93jt.jpg[/IMG]
Would also consider trading this for all 4 t206 Cobb's (backs not too important) in PSA 1-2 condition (preferably PSA 2).

Still looking.  Very interested in obtaining the 4 t206 Cobbs in PSA (SGC Ok as well) 1-2 condition for trade of this PSA 5.  Obviously, creasing is fine. Back type of no concern. Something "presentable."

Will do $3k via Paypal gift, money order, personal check.  Absolute best I can do.  

Thanks for looking.

Bump again for $3k PayPal gift, m.o., or personal check.  

Would also be willing to trade for a PSA 3-3.5-4 bat off and cash.
beauty..congrats on the sale and to the new owner.
